title: Partner Circle — New England Complex Systems Institute

seo.description:
By joining our Partner Circle on an annual subscription, you will receive:

    * 50% registration discount on all courses and conferences

    * Free copy of Making Things Work by NECSI President Yaneer Bar-Yam

    * Strategic annual remote consultation with NECSI President Yaneer
      Bar-Yam

NECSI is a non-profit 501c(3) performing research to solve social problems, 
improve healthcare and prevent violence. Donations are tax exempt.

Your generous contributions enable NECSI to find solutions to the world’s 
most pressing challenges.
